name: Cursed Wizard
description:
A wizard finds himself facing troublesome odds and must find a way to stop the dark wizard before it is too late.

Find your way through the castle to find the boss wizard at the end. You never know, you might be able to pick up some help along the way.

Single-player, side-scrolling, platformer, fantasy, adventure, and action. 

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move side to side
  • Space to jump
  • Left Mouse to shoot a spell
  • Ctrl to throw flask when in inventory
